arts.ttl: NEC Nijmegen-Go Ahead Eagles Statistical Preview
arts.sum: Go Ahead Eagles will travel to Goffertstadion on Sunday to face NEC in an Eredivisie match. In their last Eredivisie game, Go Ahead Eagles secured a 3-2 victory at home against PSV, which has placed...

arts.sum: In the wake of Rogier Meijer's announced departure from NEC Nijmegen, the club have formulated an interesting coaching shortlist.
